title: Calculating differences | 32.000 Files Scanned
body:
I left League Of Legends 5 Hour when he go to 33% and when i retern to home my League Of Legends was 33% and continue to Scanned Files :( 
What i can do ?

replies.body: Let it scan, it's repairing corrupted files and rescanning to ensure there are no more. Do something constructive while you wait ^^

As long as you aren't receiving any errors, this is totally normal.  The patcher is scanning your files for any corruption and update them.  Depending on your computer, this may take a few moments to complete.
